picked_headlines.summary: DINO-YOLO enhances object detection in civil engineering with self-supervised learning, improving accuracy while maintaining real-time performance.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article bridges AI research with practical engineering applications, showcasing advancements in object detection crucial for civil engineering projects.

picked_headlines.summary: Stripe's Agentic Commerce Protocol enables AI agents to facilitate transactions, enhancing payment systems and fraud detection in AI commerce.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This topic is relevant for stakeholders interested in the intersection of AI and commerce, highlighting innovative approaches to enhance transaction security and efficiency.

digest:
- *SPLite Hand* improves 3D hand pose estimation efficiency on edge devices using sparse convolution and a novel decoder, achieving significant speed-ups. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.16396)
- *MossNet* introduces a mixture-of-state-space-experts architecture that enhances multi-head attention, outperforming existing models in efficiency and performance. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.26182)
- *Kimi Linear* offers a new attention architecture that outperforms traditional models in efficiency and performance across various tasks. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.26692)
- *HeLU* is a new activation function that addresses the dying ReLU problem with variable thresholds, enhancing efficiency and model generalization. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2411.10573)
- *SecureReviewer* enhances LLMs for secure code review, addressing security issues with a tailored dataset and new evaluation metrics. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.26457)
- *Agentic AI Home Energy Management System* uses LLMs for autonomous home energy management, optimizing appliance scheduling from natural language inputs. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.26603)
- *AIMeter* measures AI's energy use and carbon footprint, promoting sustainable practices in AI development. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.20535)
- *FakeZero* is a client-side tool for real-time misinformation detection on social media, ensuring privacy and high accuracy with efficient models. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.25932)
- *SEA-LION* introduces advanced multilingual LLMs for Southeast Asian languages, addressing representation gaps and achieving state-of-the-art performance. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.05747)
- *FinOps Agent* automates cost optimization in IT infrastructure using AI, enhancing financial accountability. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.25914)
